question: Krishna Deva Raya invaded Bijapur in which of the following years?
explanation: When Krishna Deva Raya was campaigning in the east, Raichur doab was taken over by Ismail Adil Shah of Bijapur. Krishna Deva Raya later recaptured Raichur, Mudgal and some other regions after defeating Ismail with help from the Portuguese gunners and in 1523 CE, he invaded Bijapur and captured more forts.
